Package circeIsland.creatures

Class Circe

java.lang.Object
java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
circeIsland.creatures.Creature
circeIsland.creatures.Circe
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Circe
extends Creature
This class represents Circe, extends from the Creature It can grab the things and stole, plant, water, harvest, magic and so on.
Author:
Jiwoo Kim

    Circe​(processing.core.PImage img, double x, double y)

  • Constructor Details

    • Circe

      public Circe​(processing.core.PImage img, double x, double y)
      Initilize the Circe width and height ratio are setted to 28.57 and 12.10 other values are setted as a default that shown in Creature.java constructors
      Parameters:
      img - the Circe image
      x - x coordinate of the circe
      y - y coordinate of the circe

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act()
      inherited method. Does not do anything
      Specified by:
      act in class Creature

    • grab

      public void grab​(int boxNum)
      Reset the Circe holding index of her inventory
      Parameters:
      boxNum - The new index of her inventory

    • plant

      public void plant()
      Plant the garden that intersecting with the currently holding seeds. If Circe does not hold seeds or not intersect with the garden, it does nothing.
      Precondition:
      island has to be not null

    • getGreeting

      public boolean getGreeting()
      Returns:
      true if Circe currently opens to welcoming the nymph, false if circe does not do welcoming the nymph.

    • setGreeting

      public void setGreeting()
      Set the Circe to opens for welcoming the nymphs, if the circe does not welcomes previously, and vice versa.

    • water

      public void water()
      Water the plants in the garden. (reset the hydrated level of the garden) It only water the plants if the circe is intersects with gardenland, and hold the water. If not, it does nothing.
      Precondition:
      island has to be not null

    • harvest

      public boolean harvest​(GardenLand g)
      Harvest the garden. It only harvest if the plant is mature, and has the empty spots in inventory. After the harvest, it remove the plant from the garden, and add the mature plant to her inventory.
      Parameters:
      g - the Garden that she wants to harvest
      Returns:
      true if it suceed the planting, false otherwise.
      Precondition:
      the GardenLand has to have the crops inside

    • turnPig

      public void turnPig​(MaliciousVisitor visitor)
      The circe turn malicious visitor to the pig. Malicious visitor would be deleted in the land, and pig will spawn
      Parameters:
      visitor - the malicious visitor that circe needs to turn into pig
      Precondition:
      the Malicious visitor has to be in grid

    • draw

      public void draw​(DrawingSurface g)
      The Circe will be drawn by Creature.java draw method, and Additionally, the circe inventory would be drawn If circe is not in the grid, it does not draw anything.
      Overrides:
      draw in class Creature
      Parameters:
      g - Drawing surface object that the creature will be drawn on
      Precondition:
      Drawing Surface has to be not the null
      Postcondition:
      the drawing surface g.stroke would be set to 255,205,0, and the g.fill set to transparent

    • getInventoryByCoor

      public int getInventoryByCoor​(int x, int y)
      Get the inventory's index by inputing the x and y coordinate
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate on the screen
      y - y coordinate on the screen
      Returns:
      inventory's index that corresponds to x and y coordinates. if the coordinate does not belong to any of the inventory, it returns -1.
      Precondition:
      the island has to be not null

    • getType

      public java.lang.String getType()
      Specified by:
      getType in class Creature
      Returns:
      the type of this class ("Circe")

    • addOnInventory

      public boolean addOnInventory​(Holdable h)
      add the Holdable h to the circe inventory first empty space If the there is no empty space in the inventory, it would do nothing
      Parameters:
      h - Holdable that needs to put in circe's inventory
      Returns:
      true if the holdable successfully adds on the inventory. False otherwise

    • getInventory

      public Holdable[] getInventory()
      Returns:
      the whole inventory of the circe

    • removeFromInventory

      public void removeFromInventory​(int i)
      remove the Holdable object that circe holding in the index of i
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the circe's inventory that want to set it as null
      Precondition:
      i has to be greater than -1, and less than 6

    • rearrangeInventory

      public void rearrangeInventory​(int i, int j)
      Switiching the holdable that is on index i and holdabe that is on index j
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the circe inventory
      j - the index of the circe inventory
      Precondition:
      i and j has to be greather than -1, and less than 6

    • setInventory

      public Holdable setInventory​(int i, Holdable h)
      set the index i with the holdable h
      Parameters:
      i - index of the inventory
      h - holdable that need to be set
      Returns:
      the holdable object that originally at the index i.
      Precondition:
      0<= i < 6

    • getCurrentHold

      public int getCurrentHold()
      Returns:
      the index of circe's inventory that circe currently holding

    • inventoryContains

      public int inventoryContains​(int type)
      check the circe has the certain type of the holdable
      Parameters:
      type - holdable types
      Returns:
      -1 if the types of the holdable does not exist in her inventory, otherwise it returns index of first occurance holdable types.
